Description:
The Iron Claw is a biographical drama film about the tragic story of the Von Erich wrestling family in the 1980s. Despite creating history and starting a dynasty in professional wrestling, the family was plagued by misfortune within. Six brothers achieved great things but met untimely deaths due to drug overdoses, car accidents, prescription drugs, or suicide. Only the youngest brother, Kerry, managed to make a name for himself in wrestling after retirement and lived happily with his family.
Awards:
The Iron Claw received one award at the 95th American Film Critics Association Awards - Best Ensemble Cast.
